title: Marathon Digital's Experiment Results To Invalid BTC Block
description: According to the firm, the invalid block was mined as a result of an experiment on optimization.

title: The Scalability Solution: Understanding Layer One vs. Layer Two Blockchains
description: Layer one (L1) and layer two (L2) blockchains offer different approaches to scaling distributed ledger networks. While developers of L1 blockchains focus on improving the base protocol, L2 programmers have moved transactions off-chain to enable faster and cheaper transactions. What Are Layer One Blockchains? title: Slope Secures $30M for AI-Powered B2B Payments Platform with Backing from Sam Altman
description: In a pivotal move toward revolutionizing B2B payment solutions, Slope, the AI-powered startup headquartered in San Francisco, has announced a triumphant $30 million equity funding round. Spearheaded by Union Square Ventures, this investment round also boasts the participation of Sam Altman, the CEO and co-founder of OpenAI. Slope’s innovative approach to B2B payments seeks to ... title: Chainlink Cross-Chain Interoperability Protocol Goes Live on L2 Base
description:
Chainlink Cross-Chain Interoperability Protocol (CCIP) went live on Base earlier today. Folks Finance, a multi-chain decentralized finance platform, reportedly integrated Chainlink CCIP on Base testnet to improve cross-chain lending capabilities. Folks Finance was joined by several other crypto projects, including the NFT collection, Polychain Monsters. According to a press release by Chainlink earlier today, the […]

The post Chainlink Cross-Chain Interoperability Protocol Goes Live on L2 Base appeared first on Coin Edition.
